text:
[Verse]
Walking alone streetlight show
Whispers in the wind you know
Moonlight dances soft and slow
In the midnight glow we flow

[Verse 2]
Silent cries starry skies
Memory fades as the time flies
Hidden dreams in disguise
Underneath these eyes they rise

[Chorus]
Feel the night come alive
Electric heartbeat thrive
In the shadow we dive
Touch the light we strive

[Verse 3]
Neon signs we pass by
City hums to a lullaby
Echoes of a fleeting high
As the moments slip they fly

[Verse 4]
Colors blend stories told
In the dark secrets unfold
Chasing the horizon's gold
In the midnight I feel bold

[Bridge]
Lost in the endless blue
Finding the journey true
Every beat brand new
Under stars we grew
title: Midnight Glow
